ComicInfo.Summary: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis Part VI The Truth Machine: Heroes and villains team up to battle the armies of the Darkest Knight, who has defeated Perpetua and taken her power, while Wonder Woman and an army of Lobos travel to the Forge of Worlds in a last-ditch attempt to save the Multiverse.
